name: Paper Stamping Factory
description:
You own and operate your very own paper stamping factory! As the boss you have a lot of work to do, and since you want to go home soon you need to rush through the work.

Stamp the paper with 'z' or 'x' to the rhythm. Being on time is key to finishing the work quickly.

Controls:

Z for the stamp of approval

X for the stamp of rejection

Click to advance the text

How does this fit the theme "Boss Rush"? Well you are the "Boss" and you "Rush" to do your work. This was my interpretation of this jams theme.

Made  in 3 days for Mini Jam 6: Boss rush. Limitation: Don't use WASD or the Arrow keys
